common_issues.title: Chrome Extension Causing Stack Overflow Error
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing stack overflow errors when using the Pieces Chrome extension, particularly on macOS. The extension seems to be repeatedly filling text areas, leading to this error. Further investigation is needed to identify the specific cause and solution.

related_issues.title: Chrome Extension messing out stackoverflow
related_issues.text:
Chrome Extension messing out stackoverflow
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Web Extension

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

It fills this text endlessly...

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6b5edb10-b7cf-4fa6-a523-aa73af94cbee)
## GitHub Issue Conversation Summary

**Key Points:**

* User @luceat-lux-vestra created an issue on the Pieces-app support GitHub repository.
* The issue was automatically triaged and routed to the relevant team member.
* The user was provided with helpful resources while awaiting a response.

**Problems Identified:**

* The specific problem or issue reported by the user is not outlined in the provided conversation excerpt.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* The bot provides links to relevant resources such as existing issues, documentation, and a YouTube channel, potentially assisting the user in finding a solution or clarifying their issue.
* The issue is assigned to the appropriate team member for further investigation and resolution.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue is being addressed by the Pieces support team.
* The user is expected to receive a follow-up within 24 hours.
* The final resolution or outcome of the issue is not yet available in this conversation excerpt.

**Additional Notes:**

* The conversation excerpt is limited and only provides a snapshot of the initial interaction.
* More information is needed to fully understand the specific problem and its resolution.

recommendations: **Investigate and address the Chrome extension stack overflow error:** This issue is causing significant user frustration and should be prioritized.  Allocate development resources to identify the root cause and implement a fix.
**Improve communication around known issues:**  Proactively communicate the Chrome extension bug to users on macOS. Provide a timeline for the fix and offer potential workarounds.

**Gather more detailed information on user issues:** Encourage users to provide more context when reporting bugs, including specific browser versions, operating system details, and steps to reproduce the issue. This will help in faster diagnosis and resolution.

**Review and update documentation:** Ensure that the documentation for the Chrome extension, particularly for macOS users, is up-to-date and addresses the stack overflow error. Provide clear instructions on how to troubleshoot or mitigate the issue.
**Monitor support channels closely:** Given the high activity level on the reported issue, ensure that support channels are adequately staffed to handle user inquiries and provide timely updates.
